DataElement.preferredName: Revised International Prognostic Scoring System Maximum Score Assessment Score 1 Decimal Place Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The 1 decimal place numeric value measured, assigned or computed related to the maximum Revised International Prognostic Scoring System score.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Revised International Prognostic Scoring System Maximum Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A revision of the International Prognostic Scoring System for Myelodysplastic Syndromes. It covers the same disease factors as the IPSS, but the factors are identified in a more detailed way. The revised version includes: blasts in the bone marrow, cytogenetic abnormalities, hemoglobin level, absolute neutrophil count, and platelet count._the largest possible quantity or degree._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A revision of the International Prognostic Scoring System for Myelodysplastic Syndromes. It covers the same disease factors as the IPSS, but the factors are identified in a more detailed way. The revised version includes: blasts in the bone marrow, cytogenetic abnormalities, hemoglobin level, absolute neutrophil count, and platelet count.

Concepts.definition: A revision of the International Prognostic Scoring System for Myelodysplastic Syndromes. It covers the same disease factors as the IPSS, but the factors are identified in a more detailed way. The revised version includes: blasts in the bone marrow, cytogenetic abnormalities, hemoglobin level, absolute neutrophil count, and platelet count.
